ProjectTitle: Generator based therapeutic radiopharmaceutical production for targeting of fibroblast activation protein (FAP)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/05/2024
Data sharing: note that FWO expects that metadata of datasets generated are submitted to Lirias, so they appear in the FRIS portal. 
This is easiest done via KU Leuven RDR (research data repository): https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr

FWO requirement for datasets: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/research-results/
label: good with suggestions
